subject: Hockey, Ice
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: On breakup day, center Brad Richards refused to address whether he will be part of the team next season, while four others who will become unrestricted free agents said they hoped to remain in New York.
snippet: On breakup day, center Brad Richards refused to address whether he will be part of the team next season, while four others who will become unrestricted free agents said they hoped to remain in New York.
